primary_trope.name: countdown
primary_trope.hook_text: Where Torino Nice Rally breaks you

beats.label: HOOK
beats.narration: Here's where Torino Nice Rally breaks you. 435 mi. Zone by zone.
beats.text_on_screen: Torino Nice Rally — Where It Hurts
beats.visual: Full route map, then zoom into first zone
beats.editing_note: Start with full route visible, then rapid zoom in. Ominous music hit. Avatar suffering face.

beats.label: ZONE 1: Mile 0
beats.narration: Mile 0. Colle del Colombardo. First major challenge after leaving Turin. 'Potentially the toughest of them all.' 18%+ gradients on tarmac degrading to rough gravel doubletrack at 14%+.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Mixed Alpine terrain - paved cols, military gravel roads, rocky doubletrack

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 1 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 2: Mile 50
beats.narration: Mile 50. Colle delle Finestre. Famous Giro d'Italia climb. 19km, 1.7 thousandm vertical. Last 8km on fine gravel. Site of Chris Froome's 2018 race-winning attack.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Mixed Alpine terrain - paved cols, military gravel roads, rocky doubletrack

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 2 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 3: Mile 120
beats.narration: Mile 120. Col Agnel. Highest point at 2.8 thousandm. 20+ km climb at 6.6% average. Descent 'particularly cold and bleak, especially for toes.'
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Mixed Alpine terrain - paved cols, military gravel roads, rocky doubletrack

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 3 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 4: Mile 200
beats.narration: Mile 200. Gardetta Pass 'Little Peru'. 35km of high mountain gravel wilderness. 'Possibly the most mesmerizing gravel ride in the world.' The sweet spot of the entire event.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Mixed Alpine terrain - paved cols, military gravel roads, rocky doubletrack

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 4 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 5: Mile 350
beats.narration: Mile 350. Col de Turini. 26km unrelenting climb with 1.7 thousandm vertical. The final major Alpine test.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Mixed Alpine terrain - paved cols, military gravel roads, rocky doubletrack

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 5 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 6: Mile 400
beats.narration: Mile 400. Via del Sale. 30km unpaved finale. 'Complete joy, dream gravel, amazing views.' Last point feeling completely enveloped by Alps. Far from inhabited centers - very rare fountains.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Mixed Alpine terrain - paved cols, military gravel roads, rocky doubletrack

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 6 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).
